sentences.en: But while stomach acid is a factor, Dr. Koufman says, the real culprit for many patients is pepsin, a digestive enzyme that can exist in the esophagus.
sentences.cn: 但考夫曼博士指出，胃酸只是其中的一个因素，胃蛋白酶才是很多患者的症结所在，这是可以存在于食道的一种消化酶。

sentences.en: Gastric acidity and the concentration of pepsin were decreased.
sentences.cn: 抑制胃液的分泌,降低胃液的酸度和胃蛋白酶含量.

sentences.en: Gastric juice contains hydrochloric acid to provide an acidic solution for pepsin.
sentences.cn: 胃液内含有盐酸给胃蛋白酶提供酸溶液.

sentences.en: Koufman says, the real culprit for many patients is pepsin, a digestive enzyme that can exist in the esophagus.
sentences.cn: 胃蛋白酶是能存在于食道的一种消化酶。

sentences.en: METHODS: Retinal vascular preparations were performed by using trypsin digestion and pepsin-trypsin digestion technique respectively.
sentences.cn: 方法：分别用胰蛋白酶消化法及胃蛋白酶-胰蛋白酶联合消化法制备视网膜血管铺片，比较铺片成功率。

sentences.en: Objective : To extract Coriolus versicolor intracellular pepsin inhibitor based on ultrasonic method.
sentences.cn: 目的: 采用超声波法提取云芝胞内胃蛋白酶抑制剂.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the effect of pepsin activity on disintegration time of soft capsule.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究胃蛋白酶活力对软胶囊剂崩解时限的影响.

sentences.en: Pepsin mixture is used for dyspepsia.
sentences.cn: 骨蛋白酶合剂用于消化不良.

sentences.en: Pepsin: Powerful enzyme in gastric juice ( see stomach ) that partially digests proteins in food.
sentences.cn: 胃 蛋白: 胃液中一种消化能力极强的,能部分消化食物中的蛋白质.

sentences.en: Rennin activity ( RA ) and proteolytic activity ( PA ) of pepsin rennin and rennet were studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了胃蛋白酶、凝乳 酶 与自制皱胃酶的凝乳活力与蛋白分解活力.

sentences.en: Results The intestinal peristalsis moved slow, peptic acid secretion decreased and pepsin activity decreased.
sentences.cn: 结果双侧颈总动脉结扎后小鼠的肠蠕动减慢, 大鼠胃酸分泌减少,胃蛋白酶活性减弱.

sentences.en: The affinity of AHL with pepsin was very high.
sentences.cn: AHL也能与透明质酸以较高亲和力相结合.

sentences.en: The Aloe preparation inhibited gastric acid, stimulated pepsin and mucus secretion.
sentences.cn: 芦荟药剂能抑制胃酸?刺激胃蛋白酶和粘液分泌.

sentences.en: The enzymolysis effect of neutral protease, papain, pepsin, bromelin, flavourzyme and compound protease was studied respectively on the sleeve-fish protein.
sentences.cn: 探讨了中性蛋白酶、木瓜蛋白酶、胃蛋白酶、风味蛋白、酶菠萝蛋白酶以及复合蛋白酶对鱿鱼蛋白的酶解效果。

sentences.en: The impressively named chief cells secrete pepsinogen which, when it mixes with stomach acid, becomes an enzyme called pepsin.
sentences.cn: 而令人印象深刻的主细胞则分泌胃蛋白酶原，当它与胃酸混合时，就形成一种酶，叫做胃蛋白酶。

sentences.en: The interaction of rutin and pepsin has been studied by ultraviolet and fluorescent spectrometry.
sentences.cn: 采用紫外光谱和荧光光谱研究芦丁与胃蛋白酶的相互作用.

sentences.en: The pepsin can digest the protein in food.
sentences.cn: 胃蛋白酶能消化食物中的蛋白质.

sentences.en: The pepsin contents of gastric juice were determined by JacalinHRP ELISA assay.
sentences.cn: 方法:采用HRP标记 jacalin,通过elisa法检测各种胃病患者胃液中的胃蛋白酶.

sentences.en: The pepsin soluble collagen was extracted by pepsin hydrolysis of theof the sea cucumber Stichopus japonicus.
sentences.cn: 以海参体壁为原料,采用胃蛋白酶水解法提取酶促溶性胶原.

sentences.en: This paper has studied the extraction of collagen from porcine skin by trypsin, papain and pepsin.
sentences.cn: 研究了用胰酶 、 木瓜蛋白酶和胃蛋白酶从猪皮中提取胶原蛋白.

trans.tran_en: a liquid in your stomach that changes food into a form that your body can use
